title: Low Elo Jungler
body:
Ive recently got {{champion:5}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:33}} all to M7 and im trying to find my next jungle champion

What higher elo champions are about the same play style as these but have more outplay potential?

Ive been think about {{champion:421}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:141}} but i just dont want to get too invested to realize its not that great for outplay 

What do you guys consider to be the best low elo junglers and best high elo junglers? If you can suggest something similar to what I know I would appreciate it!

replies.body:
Hey mate,

A great suggestion in my opinion is https://m.youtube.com/user/virkayu, great content creator who goes in depth about low Leo juggling, how to climb, banking, clears and pretty much everything.

In terms of champions to pick up in low elo:
{{champion:59}} amazing ganking potential, low skill cap, intense jungle pressure if ahead, simple to learn, down side no proper outplay potential. Meta champ 
{{champion:11}} Extremely low skill required although high outplay potential. Literally brain dead :| but not meta atm.
{{champion:154}}  highly underrated jungler due to recent cinderhulk buffs, good outplay potential, good ganking, average clear, not meta
{{champion:254}} meta champion at the moment, fairly simple to learn
{{champion:20}} strong champion especially in the early game, stupid good ganking potential, good jungle clears

Basically these are some personal champs good for low elo although I should stress that anything will work in low elo, just give them a try in practice tool and normal draft games. Watch some videos online and you should be g.

High elo:
{{champion:64}}  good champ if learnt. Highly popular amongst junglers. I hate him personally sometimes he feels like a brain dead champ....
{{champion:121}} my main, high outplay potential, mediocre skill although can be utilised to destroy players, literally.
{{champion:107}} same as kha but requires more skill
{{champion:35}} good in the hands of a one trick although he has been gutted from indirect nerfs
 {{champion:203}} high skill champions, marksman, stupid scaling with marks (come so with skill), some what meta.
{{champion:427}} literally my dad, highly underrated pick and if utilised by a god can actually carry game so and more or less make the enemy jungler leave the game XD, I lied but he can still be strong and has a unique play style.
{{champion:59}} yea already said
{{champion:421}} 
{{champion:120}} strong champ atm can Be used in low elo
{{champion:141}} red or blue kayn does well, unique champion who is strong in both elo especially red Kayne / rhaast

There are many other high elo champs but they’d can all work in different elo’s But I mean currently I need a rush to write this, I may come back later and edit this but I recommend that YouTube channel listed some where above.

More then learning a champ it’s also important to learn the jungle as a whole. Jungle is more complicated then running around skating camps.

I’m also gold btw and can’t  climb XD

Enjoy!

 virkayu is the YouTuber btw

No dont put kindred there. You can only play her viabally plat 2+

I would assume that you are considering one region that you play on. Saying that kindred only works I play 2 games or higher shows a lack of knowledge of the champion.

Kindred can work at any elo but is preferred in the higher ranks as I said in my post :| (please read before commenting). This is due to the high level of skill required to play her well, this includes mark placements, ganking paths, dragon control, vision control and more importantly playing around your champions arc type being a marksman.

As I said before there is nothing wrong about playing certain champs at any elo, it’s all about your skill and how you impact the game. If it was a normal draft pick.... throw that all out the window play what ever you want :)

ok but kindred just cant solo carry for shit no matter how fed she is. I tried maining her and nothing was working. I got fed every game and ended up losinge
All about items, your skill and marks

Ekko, Elise, Nidalee, Evelynn, and AP Shyvana are solid higher-elo junglers.  Lee Sin is good at any elo.  So is Hecarim.  Twitch is a low elo jungler, not a high elo one because everyone knows how to counter him.  Rengar is great in low elo.

> [{quoted}](name=Alzon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UhpY25Wf,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-04-11T18:15:53.781+0000)
>
> Ekko, Elise, Nidalee, Evelynn, and AP Shyvana are solid higher-elo junglers.  Lee Sin is good at any elo.  So is Hecarim.  Twitch is a low elo jungler, not a high elo one because everyone knows how to counter him.  Rengar is great in low elo.

If Elise is good at higher elo then why is she awful at lower elo? Higher skill with better payoff should translate to more wins in low elo if you ask me?

A smurf on Elise in low elo dominates. A Low elo Elise in Low elo doesn't, because reaction times are slow, and rotating between her two skill pages in the right rotation and getting in ganks early game is a learned craft. Low elo players typically farm too long, too early, never start the snowball, and suck at reacting to aoes.
How do you counter a level 2 high elo Twitch with Conquerer?
